containers.name: s3-sync-egress
args: set -e; while true; do sleep 30; aws s3 sync "/storage" "s3://pc360-prod-chartmuseum/pc360-prod-chartmuseum/"; aws s3 sync "s3://pc360-prod-chartmuseum/pc360-prod-chartmuseum/" "/storage"; done
